title: Cable Sucks...
body: "<a href="http://www.wired.com/news/wiredmag/1,2167,63747,00.html">Cable TV is like a crappy pizza joint: You can order a small, medium, or large pie, but you can't design your own - and no slices</a>."  Reading the BS-laden interview with the Time Warner exec makes me want to switch to a satellite-based service even more.  Then what would I do with my TiVo?  I guess I'll have to wait till either the <a href="http://www.wired.com/news/digiwood/0,1412,63776,00.html">Home Media option goes on sale again</a> or  TiVo just starts offering full video-on-demand via broadband.<br/><br/>[Update]: <a href="http://www.tivo.com/4.9.asp">According to this</a> it looks like I already have the Home Media Option.  I guess it's free with all Series 2 TiVos now.  How awesome is that?  Looks like I'm stuck with cable for awhile now.  :-/
